original: Lindencrona, Jon Gudmund Haldan, tings domare, Göteborg, f. 13/2/02 i Jönköp. av v. här :hövd. Haldan L. o. Elin von Sydows. G. 35 m. Barbro Edling. Barn: Elisabeth f. 36, Catharina 39, Anne-Charlotte 42, Per-Gud-mund 45. — Stud:ex. i Karlskrona 21, jur. kand. i Upps. 27. E. o. not. i Svea hovr. 27, tf. domhav. v. olika doms., tjg. v. Göta hovr. sed. 29, bitr. fiskal där 31, tf. fiskal 32, e. fiskal 33, assessor 36, tf. här:hövd. i Aspelands O’. Handbörds doms. 40-41, tingsdom. i Askims, Hisings o. Sävedals doms. sed. 43.
translated:
Lindencrona, Jon Gudmund Haldan, district judge, Gothenburg, born February 13, 1902 in Jönköping, son of headmaster Haldan L. and Elin von Sydows. Married in 1935 to Barbro Edling. Children: Elisabeth (born 1936), Catharina (born 1939), Anne-Charlotte (born 1942), Per-Gudmund (born 1945).

Education: Student examination in Karlskrona in 1921, Bachelor of Law in Uppsala in 1927. Acting notary in Svea Court of Appeal in 1927, temporary judge in various courts, serving in Göta Court of Appeal since 1929. Assistant prosecutor there in 1931, temporary prosecutor in 1932, permanent prosecutor in 1933, assessor in 1936, temporary headmaster in Aspelands O'. Handbörds district court in 1940-1941, district judge in Askim, Hisingen and Sävedal district courts since 1943.

employmentHistory.title: District Judge
employmentHistory.location: Askim, Hisingen, and Sävedal District Courts
